lead_paragraph: DEATH OF AN OLD CITIZEN.---Bildad Merrells, sen., one of our oldest and most respectable citizens, died very suddenly yesterday morning. He had commenced to prepare himself for church in the morning, but not felling very well, he determined to remain at home. Before the services at church were over, a message came to his relations in attendance, that their sire was no more!
